attributes.action: Save the UK -  ReduceTaxation upon vehicle Fuel
attributes.additional_details:
Fuel prices the highest in Europe due in the main to 60% taxation. This is reducing vehicle usage & increasing prices of basic products.
Reduce taxation upon fuel to 40% for 2yrs to encourage growth of the ecconomy by reduction of associated transport costs.  NEVER MIND  A COUPLE OF PENCE PER LITRE HERE & THERE!
Private motoring will increase to achieve Government's current taxation revenue.
